title: Jon Arbuckle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heat some lasagna for your target, giving them Overprotective defense and immunity to negative effects. (1 use)
- Watch what's on the TV for a long time, learning 2 random notunseen roles in the game and 2 players that have it, but not which one has which specifically. (1 use)
- Fix the clock that the pesky cat messed with, instantly adding another night phase right after this one, only deaths are announced between them. (1 use)
- Kick a player, attacking them. You may also aim a player to kick them at, redirecting your kick victim to that player. (1 use)
- Ask any non unseen player for some food in their fridge, leaning their attributes, you may copy one of them permanently. (1 use)
- Invine another player's house during the day, they will reject you, they are unable to use a visiting ability the next night and are notified of it. (1 use)

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- During the day, have Odie deal with the rats? i think one was named Nermal? goofy ass name, but anyways, the rats apparently take care of all whispers, so whispering is disabled for the next day. (1 use)
- Blame one bad thing that happened to a player on Garfield, if they are executed, choose one of your abilities or their abilities, you gain a copy of it with infinite ammo. Can be multitasked. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit or are visited by a dog role, you are forced to pet them, giving them Basic defense.
- Wolves count as dogs they're just big fluffier dogs.
- All of the latex roles also count as dogs jon loves furries.
- You're roleblock immune on irl mondays good job on not being lazy jon. :D
